entry.title: Welcome to my lab
entry.content:
Hey There!

Thank you for paying me a visit. This is my experiment lab where I'll be sharing my ideas and work on web.

What I like to work on most is:

  • HTML5
  • JavaScript
  • PHP

And that's what I'll be using to present my ideas. I'll be working on tutorials, guides and innovative usage of existing APIs/services.

You can follow my on Twitter for updates or subscribe to receive emails about new content.
